channel.title: Webclient (I've tried and tried and I get same problem)
channel.description:
Hello, I'm not really too concerned about making a web-client right now but I keep trying every now and again with the same results. The following information is what I have already done and I will then explain the error:
I followed Ric's Webclient Tutorial found [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html]here[/url].
[ul][li]I edited my client.java to have my cache download link and all the methods for that are in there as well.[/li] [li]I have compiled and Jarred my client with JAR Maker from Ric's Tutorial.[/li] [li]I uploaded my webclient page, cache, client.jar, and my certificate all to my web server.[/li][/ul]
When I try to load my client locally it downloads the cache fine, but when I try to run it off my web page on the web server it displays the message: "Downloading Cache" for about 2-3 seconds and then comes up with another message: "Client Updated - Please Reload Client."
If anyone has any ideas on what might be wrong, please post them here if you might be able to help. Thank you, I really don't know what is making this act up.
-Ghostly150

item.title: Webclient (I've tried and tried and I get same problem)
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Hello, I’m not really too concerned about making a web-client right now but I keep trying every now and again with the same results. The following information is what I have already done and I will then explain the error:

I followed Ric’s Webclient Tutorial found here.

[ul][li]I edited my client.java to have my cache download link and all the methods for that are in there as well.[/li]
[li]I have compiled and Jarred my client with JAR Maker from Ric’s Tutorial.[/li]
[li]I uploaded my webclient page, cache, client.jar, and my certificate all to my web server.[/li][/ul]

When I try to load my client locally it downloads the cache fine, but when I try to run it off my web page on the web server it displays the message: “Downloading Cache” for about 2-3 seconds and then comes up with another message: “Client Updated - Please Reload Client.”

If anyone has any ideas on what might be wrong, please post them here if you might be able to help. Thank you, I really don’t know what is making this act up.

-Ghostly150
